title: I love the track where is the love with the black eyed peas. What songs can you recommend to me? - Quora

response.answer_text: Heres my selection with the first 4 definitely being the most relevant. Enjoy…. Twista- Hope. R. Kelly - sign of a victory Jzee - Hardknock life. Eminem - Toy Soldiers.Eminem not afraid Macklemore - same love Joey badass - land of the free Kanye West - homecoming MGK - see my tears Black eyed peas - one tribe Knaan - Waving flag Enjoy….
